sentences.en: At stake is the success or failure of world trade talks.
sentences.cn: 世界贸易谈判正处于成败的重要关头。

sentences.en: Attempts to find civilian volunteers have met with embarrassing failure.
sentences.cn: 寻找平民志愿者的种种尝试都遭遇了令人难堪的失败。

sentences.en: Criticizing will only destroy a relationship and create feelings of failure.
sentences.cn: 批评责备只能破坏关系，让人产生失败感。

sentences.en: Failure is never quite so frightening as regret do.
sentences.cn: 比失败更令人恐惧的是懊悔。

sentences.en: He remained in a critical condition after suffering heart failure.
sentences.cn: 他发生心力衰竭后病情一直危重。

sentences.en: He was being treated for kidney failure.
sentences.cn: 他因肾衰竭正在接受治疗。

sentences.en: He was undismayed by the prospect of failure.
sentences.cn: 想到可能会失败，他并不气馁。

sentences.en: I always felt a bit of a failure at school.
sentences.cn: 我上学时总觉得自己有点失败。

sentences.en: I just felt I had been a failure in my personal life.
sentences.cn: 我就是觉得我的个人生活很失败。

sentences.en: It is the easy way out to blame others for our failure.
sentences.cn: 把我们的失败归罪到别人头上倒是省事。

sentences.en: Responsibility for success or failure lies squarely with the Nigerians.
sentences.cn: 成败完全取决于尼日利亚人。

sentences.en: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.--Winston Churchill
sentences.cn: 成功不是终点，失败也并非末日，最重要的是继续前进的勇气。

sentences.en: Successful people often aren’t very good at dealing with failure.
sentences.cn: 一帆风顺的人往往不太擅长应对失败。

sentences.en: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.--Paulo Coelho
sentences.cn: 世界上只有一样东西可以阻止梦想实现，那就是害怕失败。

sentences.en: This was an uncharitable assessment of the reasons for the failure.
sentences.cn: 这是对失败原因毫不讲情面的分析评估。

sentences.en: Three attempts on the British 200-metre record also ended in failure.
sentences.cn: 对英国200米纪录发起的3次冲击也均以失败而告终。

sentences.en: What determines whether you are a career success or a failure?
sentences.cn: 事业的成败取决于哪些因素？

words.tran_cn: 失败，不成功（fail的过去式和过去分词）
失败，不及格；破产；缺乏；衰退
不及格；使失望；忘记；舍弃

phrases.tran_cn: 慢性肾功能衰竭；慢性肾衰竭
充血性心力衰竭，郁血性心脏衰竭
失效准则；故障判据；抗剪强度破坏准则
疲劳失效；疲劳破坏；疲劳断裂

trans.tran_cn: 失败，失败的事/人，没做到，故障，破产，歉收
trans.tran_en: a lack of success in achieving or doing something
